#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
            cin>>t;
            while(t--)
            {
                int n;
                cin>>n;
                int a[n];
                vector<int>b;
                for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
                {

                    cin>>a[i];
                }
                int j=0;
                for(int i=0;i<n-1;)
                {
                    char s;
                    cin>>s;
                    if(s=='a')
                    {
                        a[i+1]=a[i]+a[i+1];
                        a[i]=1;
                        i++;
                    }
                    else i++;
                }
                long long int res=1;
                for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
                {
                    res=(res*a[i])%1000000007;
                }
                cout<<res<<"\n";

            }
}
